sentences.sentence: He waved a thin hand which ought really to have been covered with royal signet rings made of rubies.
sentences.translation: 他挥了挥手，那只纤细的手真应该戴满有王室徽章的红宝石戒指。

sentences.sentence: To this hour on the border of the lake is shown a half-dug trench—the signet of their impiety.
sentences.translation: 时至今日，湖边仍有一条掘了一半的沟——它便是人们对仙人不敬的罪证。

sentences.sentence: Medallions of his fur-capped head were struck, engravings were hung in homes, and his likeness graced snuffboxes and signet rings.
sentences.translation: 他戴着皮帽的头像被雕刻在各种场合，居民家里也会悬挂画像，鼻烟盒甚至印章戒指上都有他的头像。
